validation.required: Please fill in your primary email or username.

texts.resetPasswordInfo: Provide your primary email address or your username and we will send you details with special link to reset your password.
texts.resetPasswordInstructionsEmailed: It should be there momentarily. Please check your email and click the link in the message. After one hour, the link to update your password will expire.

messages.passwordRequestFail: Password reset instruction couldn't be send.
